word - by - word attention.from sentence: First , replacing the word - by - word attention with Attentive Reader style attention decreases the EM score by about 4.5 % , showing the strength of our proposed attention mechanism .

POS feature ( 1 ) and question - word fe.from sentence: The result shows that POS feature ( 1 ) and question - word feature ( 3 ) are the two most important features .

DCR model.from sentence: Finally , combining the DCR model with the proposed POS - trie constraints yields a score similar to the one obtained using the DCR model with all possible n-gram chunks .
